title: Former Uber security chief Joe Sullivan avoids prison in data breach coverup
description: More than 180 letters were filed with the judge praising Sullivan and asking that he be spared jail time for covering up the hack of data of 50 million Uber customers.

title: The ultimate guide to managing your passwords
description: Celebrate World Password Day by making sure your online accounts are as safe as can be, starting with good password hygiene and two-factor authentication.

title: Google shared AI knowledge with the world — until ChatGPT caught up
description: Google's research teams helped create the AI revolution. Now executives want to make sure the company takes advantage of that knowledge first.

title: White House will meet with tech CEOs about AI risks
description: The CEOs of Microsoft, Google, Anthropic and OpenAI will meet with Harris and other Biden administration officials concerned about the artificial intelligence boom.
